name: Grilled Chicken Kebabs with Herbed Orzo & Watermelon-Feta Salad
description: Quickly grill chicken kebabs and pair with lemon-herb orzo and a crisp watermelon-cucumber-feta salad. Mild, bright flavors for an easy family braai night.
prep_steps: Preheat OutdoorGrill to medium-high heat; clean and oil grates.
Bring a medium pot of salted water to a boil for the orzo.
Finely chop parsley (about 1/4 cup) and set aside.
Cut watermelon into 2 cm cubes (about 4 cups).
Slice cucumber into half-moons (2 cups) and thinly slice red onion (1/2 small).
Juice 1 lemon and zest half of it; keep separate.
In a large bowl, add watermelon, cucumber, red onion, and crumble feta cheese.
cook_steps: Drizzle chicken kebabs with olive oil; season with salt, black pepper, and a pinch of oregano.
Grill chicken kebabs for 8–10 minutes, turning every 2–3 minutes, until cooked through with light char.
While kebabs cook, boil orzo for 8–9 minutes until al dente; drain well.
Return orzo to the warm pot; add olive oil, lemon zest, half the chopped parsley, a pinch of oregano, salt, and black pepper. Toss and adjust seasoning.
Dress the watermelon salad: add olive oil and half the lemon juice; toss gently. Add remaining parsley and a pinch of black pepper.
Rest kebabs 2 minutes, then serve with herbed orzo and the watermelon-feta salad. Offer extra lemon wedges from the remaining lemon juice if desired.
